barbers.name: Lay Kpaw Wah
barbers.bio: My name is Lay Kpaw Wah. I go to a barber school called Beyond Measure Barbering Institute in Mebane, NC. I have been in for 6 months. My goal is to open up my own barber shop one day.

barbers.name: Sasuke
barbers.bio: My name is Sasuke. I go to a barber school called Beyond Measure Barbering Institute in Mebane, NC. I have been in for 4 months. My goal is to open up my own barber shop one day.
